zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：短线震荡偏强运行
zh.content:
当前价格报1940.2美元，24小时涨幅0.73%，整体维持温和上行节奏。日内高点1943.47美元，低点1922.31美元，波动区间相对收敛，显示多空力量暂处均衡，但价格重心缓慢上移，短线结构偏多。

均线方面，价格明显运行于SMA20（1888.70）上方，且均线呈抬升状态，表明中短期趋势维持多头排列。MACD数值为18.96，处于零轴上方，动能柱维持正值，说明多头动能仍在释放，但需警惕高位钝化风险。

关键支撑位关注1920美元一线，其次为1888美元均线支撑；上方阻力集中在1945美元至1960美元区间，若有效突破并放量，或打开进一步上行空间，否则可能形成区间震荡。

操作策略上，短线可依托1920美元附近低吸布局，多单止损设于1885美元下方；若突破1945美元并确认站稳，可顺势跟进。仓位控制在合理范围内，避免高位追涨带来的回撤风险。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is trading at 1940.2, holding near the upper end of the 24-hour range between 1922.31 and 1943.47. The modest 0.73% daily gain reflects steady buying interest rather than aggressive momentum. Price action remains constructive, with higher intraday lows suggesting short-term accumulation. The broader structure appears mildly bullish as ETH continues to trade comfortably above key short-term moving averages.

The 20-day simple moving average at 1888.70 sits well below current price, reinforcing the short-term uptrend and acting as dynamic support. The positive MACD reading at 18.96 indicates bullish momentum remains intact, although the absence of the signal line limits crossover confirmation. Even so, a sustained positive MACD histogram typically supports continuation bias unless momentum begins to flatten or diverge.

Immediate resistance is seen around 1945–1950, near the recent intraday high. A decisive break above this zone could open the path toward the psychological 2000 level, where profit-taking may intensify. On the downside, initial support lies near 1920, followed by stronger structural support around 1885–1890, aligning with the 20-day SMA. A breakdown below that region would weaken the short-term bullish outlook.

From a trading perspective, short-term participants may consider buying pullbacks toward 1920 with tight risk controls below 1885. Momentum traders could look for confirmation on a clean breakout above 1950 before targeting higher levels. Conservative traders may prefer waiting for either a retracement closer to moving average support or clearer momentum confirmation to reduce exposure to potential range-bound volatility.
